ee:message.ee:set-payload: %dw 2.0 output application/xml --- { <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <config> <timeout>0</timeout> <soapAttachmentStyle>SwA</soapAttachmentStyle> <timeoutType>Seconds</timeoutType> <service>orderService</service> <servicePort>createOrderEndpoint1</servicePort> <operation>Operation</operation> <soapAction>/Service/orderService.serviceagent/createOrderEndpoint1/Operation</soapAction> <endpointURL>http://localhost:9090/Service/orderService.serviceagent/createOrderEndpoint1</endpointURL> <authScheme>NONE</authScheme> </config> <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ns0:inputBindings xmlns:ns0="http://xmlns.tibco.com/bw/process/2003"> <inputMessage> <ee:customer xmlns:ns1="http://xmlns.example.com/unique/default/namespace/1134438639123"> <ee:customerid> <xsl:value-of xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" select="XYZ133"/> </ee:customerid> <ee:firstname> <xsl:value-of xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" select="Michael"/> </ee:firstname> <ee:lastname> <xsl:value-of xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" select="Smith"/> </ee:lastname> <ee:age> <xsl:value-of xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" select="36"/> </ee:age> <ee:email> <xsl:value-of xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" select="test@ibm.com"/> </ee:email> <ee:city> <xsl:value-of xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" select="Bangalore"/> </ee:city> <ee:zipcode> <xsl:value-of xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" select="500600"/> </ee:zipcode> <ee:transactionstatus> <xsl:value-of xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" select="order placed"/> </ee:transactionstatus> </ee:customer> </inputMessage> </ns0:inputBindings>}
